intro: Microsoft Data Science Hackathon invites students to solve real-world data problems using machine learning and analytics. Participants can work in teams, submit practical solutions, and compete for prizes and recognition.
jobDescription: This hackathon challenges participants to design data-driven solutions using open datasets and modern ML workflows. Teams will be evaluated based on innovation, model quality, practical impact, and presentation quality.
responsibilities: Analyze the problem statement and define approach
Prepare and clean datasets for modeling
Build and evaluate machine learning models
Create a concise final presentation and demo
Submit code and documentation before deadline
minQualifications: Student in undergraduate or postgraduate program
Basic Python and data analysis skills
prefQualifications: Experience with notebooks and visualization tools
howToApply: Register using the official event link, form a team (or join one), and submit your solution before the final deadline.
author: StudentTechProjects Team
